instruction: Classify dogs into different breeds.
output: The Labrador Retriever is a large, friendly, and intelligent breed of dog. They are excellent family dogs and can also be trained to be assistance dogs. They were originally bred to help fishermen haul innets of fish from the sea. Their coats can be black, yellow, or chocolate-colored.

instruction: Generate an article summarizing the Biden-Harris 2020 US Presidential election campaign.
output: Former Vice President Joe Biden and Senator Kamala Harris launched their 2020 US Presidential campaign in April 2019. The Biden-Harris campaign focused on issues of health care, economic fairness, climate change, racial justice, foreign policy, and other topics. Biden and Harris criss-crossed the country in an effort to make their case directly to voters and to build a broad, diverse coalition. They also made use of digital campaigns in order to reach a wider audience. Their strong message about “restoring the soul of America” resonated with voters and ultimately Biden and Harris were successful in defeating the incumbent president in a historic election.

instruction: Add a point to a list of tips for starting a business
input: Create a business plan, develop a marketing strategy and secure funding.
output: Create a business plan, develop a marketing strategy and secure funding, and find a mentor or advisor to help you navigate the business landscape.

instruction: Create a travel guide to Hawaii
output:
Welcome to Hawaii, the beautiful and diverse archipelago of islands in the middle of the Pacific Ocean. From the stunning beaches of Oahu, to the stunning volcano of the Big Island, to the vibrant culture of Maui, Hawaii has something for everyone. With its unbeatable weather, Flora and Fauna, and unbeatable cuisine, the only thing left to do is plan your trip. 

For the perfect getaway, consider booking accommodation in Kona on the Big Island. Here, you can explore the diverse nature of the island, from the beautiful beaches to the rustic forests. There are a variety of resorts and hotels with something for every budget. 

For beach activities in Hawaii, you can’t go wrong with spending a day in Waikiki, or at Hanauma Bay in Oahu. There are plenty of other activities to try, such as kayaking and snorkeling, as well as touring the coffee plantations on the Big Island. 

For nightlife, there is no better place than Honolulu. Here, you can enjoy all the modern amenities, as well as some of the best restaurants and bars. You can also take part in a luau, or sample some of the best seafood Hawaii has to offer. 

Finally, when you visit Hawaii, be sure to experience the culture. Visit historic sites, learn about the history, and indulge in the unique cuisine and hospitality of the islanders. With a little planning, you can create the perfect Hawaiian getaway.

instruction: Compose a tweet introducing the PBS show Masterpiece
output: Discover the classics you always loved and the new favorites you'll never forget with #MasterpiecePBS! From beloved classics like @poldarkpbs to modern favorites like Sanditon, get ready to watch, discuss and analyze every Sunday 8/7c on PBS. #Masterpiece

instruction: Generate a story about an alien who visits Earth
output:
Once upon a time, there was an alien from a distant planet who ventured to Earth. He was fascinated by the world he encountered, but also amazed and confused by how differently the people on Earth acted compared to those on his home planet. Everywhere he went, he encountered new and strange phenomena, such as powerful storms and a vast variety of animals.

One day, as he was exploring a city, he encountered a human for the first time. He was astounded by the small being, and the human seemed just as amazed to see him. The alien was overjoyed to answer the human's many questions, and he shared all that he knew about his home planet. In return, the human shared the history of earth and its various cultures. 

The alien was touched by the kindness of the human, and he decided to stay a while, get to know Earth better, and make new friends. In the end, he felt so connected to the Earthlings that he chose to explore Earth further, and soon enough, he became a part of the greater human family.

instruction: Rewrite a sentence by changing the verb
output: Molly bounced on the couch

instruction: Create a list of home organization tips
output:
1. Declutter every room by sorting items into make sure none are overlooked 
2. Create a designated spot for each belonging to ensure items can easily be found
3. Use storage containers for easy organization and accessibility 
4. Have a place for guest items and items to donate
5. Focus on one room at a time to avoid feeling overwhelmed 
6. Utilize multi-purpose furniture to maximize storage 
7. Use vertical space to store items 
8. Label storage containers so items can be found easily 
9. Make sure walkways are clear of clutter 
10. Store items near where they will be used

input:

Condition: All cats are mammals

2. Buy generic products instead of brand names.
3. Make a budget and stick to it.

instruction: Write a story that features a character whose life changed dramatically because of a dream.
output:
John had always been an ordinary person. He worked hard but never seemed to get ahead. He was content with his life but wished for more. One night, he had a strange dream. In it, he discovered an ancient map that led to a treasure. He saw himself sailing across a great ocean and finding a hidden island with a pile of gold and jewels.

When he woke up, he knew that he had to follow his dream. He quit his job, sold all of his possessions, and set out on a great adventure. With a lot of luck, he found the island and the treasure. Finally, he was a rich man.

John used his wealth to do many good things. He built a school for children in the poorest neighborhoods, established a local hospital, and donated to a number of charities. His life had changed drastically because of his dream and he was proud of the difference he was making in the world.

instruction: Generate a plausible title for a movie starring a character named Arjun.
output: The Adventures of Arjun: A Journey of Discovery.

instruction: Summarize a news article about climate change.
input: Climate change is causing more extreme and extreme weather, making wildfires more intense and droughts more severe.
output: Climate change is causing more extreme weather, leading to more intense wildfires and prolonged droughts. This is having a serious impact on the environment and people's lives worldwide.
